}

require_once('../bootstrap/app.php');

$token = $_SESSION['token'];
$_SESSION["completeTime"] = microtime(true);
// Create new instance of S4ExpressCheckoutRequest class.
$request = new S4ExpressCheckoutRequest();

// Retrieve the token.
$request->setToken($token);

// Run finalize transaction.
$response = S4ExpressCheckout::finalizeExpressCheckout($request);

$year = substr($response->getExpirationDate(), 0, 2);     // Get the year from the expiration date

// Display receipt page to customer.

echo "function submitForm() {\n";
echo "  document.getElementById('formId').action = 'emailReceipt.php';\n";
echo "  document.getElementById('formId').submit();	\n";
echo "}\n";
echo "</script>\n";
echo "</head><body id="rAU1IHXkx7" data-rand="seRpcqgNlW">";

// Echo out messages indicating success.

echo "Your " . $response->getCardType() . " ending in " . $response->getMaskedCardNumber() . " was charged " . $response->getCurrency(). $response->getAmount() ."."."<br id="drrcRwMUuY" data-rand="Gi02lAybRX" /><br id="scce9d2reR" data-rand="k254ZzC3Kc" /></h3>";
$time = $_SESSION["completeTime"] - $_SESSION["startTime"];
echo "Total Time:".$time."";
echo "<br id="gdnF7OEzOW" data-rand="WIUQhYAXPG"/>Token:".$token;
echo "<br id="qgSCCrQzxw" data-rand="X4g8xhWn3t"/>\n";
echo "<form data-rand="hxLEpnAD7l" method='post' id='formId' action=''>";

echo "</form>\n";
echo "</center></body></html>";

?>

require_once('../bootstrap/app.php');

// Create new instance of S4ExpressCheckoutRequest class.
$request = new S4ExpressCheckoutRequest();
$_SESSION["startTime"] = microtime(true);
// Set Credentials
$request->setPassword("testpage");
$request->setMerchantId("WEBPAGE0001");
$request->setUsername("webpage");

// Set Transaction Details
$request->setTransactionAmount("100");	// Amount of this order.
$request->setCurrency("USD");			// Currency to use for this order.
$request->setUpchargeAmount('0');

$request->setAutoReturn("true", "3", "http://".$_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'].dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'])."/dollar1nocharge_receipt.php");

$request->setHideTabs("ACCOUNT,CUSTOMER,TRANSACTION");

$request->setMerchantDefined2("Merchant Defined 2");

$request->setReturnRevenueData("true");

// Initialize the express checkout.
$response = S4ExpressCheckout::initExpressCheckout($request);

// Get the response code from the server.
$responseCode = $response->getResponseCode();

// Check for error.
if ($responseCode != "1") {
    // An error occurred.  Display error page to customer.
    echo "<html id="gyi6N3FiPQ" data-rand="Gb5Xqa4xjp">";

    echo "<tr id="Apf42rBVwl" data-rand="902t8IipCp"><td id="sGzDHoa5SY" data-rand="6v80kSFBED">Error Message:</td><td id="apZHw6ElRe" data-rand="9DTT2j8QVS">".$response->getErrorMessage()."</td></tr>";
    echo "</table></center></body>";
    echo "</html>";
} else {
    // No error occurred.
    $token = $response->getToken();
    $_SESSION['token'] = $token;

    // Set the token into a hidden variable.
    print "<input id="tCbCwe6Azo" data-rand="SRPRmViDYn" name=\"Token\" type=\"hidden\" value=\"$token\">";

    // Redirect to the payment page to collect account information.
    print "<script id="Kzdqw4QoOD" data-rand="Ul7czymwc1" type=\"text/javascript\" language=\"javascript\"> document.location = \"".$response->getRedirectUrl()."\";</script>";
}

function spamCheck($field) {
  // Sanitize $field
  $field = filter_var($field, FILTER_SANITIZE_EMAIL);

  // Validate $field
  if (filter_var($field, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL)) {
    return TRUE;
  } else {
    return FALSE;
  }
}

// '					is for an auth-only transaction using tokenization.							'
// *************************************************************************************************
require_once('../bootstrap/app.php');

// Create new instance of S4ExpressCheckoutRequest class.
$request = new S4ExpressCheckoutRequest();
$_SESSION["startTime"] = microtime(true);
// Set Credentials
// Set Credentials
$request->setPassword("testpage");
$request->setMerchantId("WEBPAGE0001");
$request->setUsername("webpage");

// Set Transaction Details
$request->setTransactionAmount("100");	// Amount of this order.
$request->setCurrency("USD");			// Currency to use for this order.

// Set Page Customization Options
$request->setAutoReturn("true", "3", "http://".$_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'].dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'])."/tokenization_receipt.php");
$request->setUseIframe("true");
$request->setHideTabs("ACCOUNT,CUSTOMER,TRANSACTION");
$request->setShowLogoffButton("true");

// Add Merchant Defined Fields
$request->setMerchantReference("12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890");		// 50 Characters Max
$request->setMerchantDefined1("Merchant Defined 1");
$request->setMerchantDefined2("Merchant Defined 2");
$request->setMerchantDefined3("Merchant Defined 3");

// For additional options see the "ITSA Web Service Integration Guide".
$request->setReturnRevenueData("true");
$request->setTokenizeCard("true");

// Initialize the express checkout.
$response = S4ExpressCheckout::initExpressCheckout($request);

// Get the response code from the server.
$responseCode = $response->getResponseCode();

// Check for error.
if ($responseCode != "1") {
    // An error occurred.  Display error page to customer.
    echo "<html id="tnQjV6tXbL" data-rand="RMeprgz5mL">";
    echo "<head id="phmNYyhL8G" data-rand="BzuV0saBi5"><title id="A0qUwmq8Y2" data-rand="nW7eMGtew1">Error</title></head>";
    echo "<body id="IeAAiNtO1Q" data-rand="2mHAOaf1OA"><center id="T8fcNb2vrl" data-rand="W280TNMX14"><h1 id="zzPVb4az0w" data-rand="zJp73IGhIB">Error</h1><br id="AOpORXSnGB" data-rand="Yk3FBzP29r"><br id="KskOEU2Yuo" data-rand="kCZ7BtRGQk"><table id="rPnlxhMysm" data-rand="WZUNzHGxOa">";
    echo "<tr id="wrPy0gM6ED" data-rand="c31Wky2rUL"><td id="dbJg7MYFvs" data-rand="O4eto7iVBa">Error Code:</td><td id="mchH20aDqD" data-rand="vAaiHNEBKq">".$response->getErrorCode()."</td></tr>";
    echo "<tr id="i93NnjwVqS" data-rand="KLCwsLrlCI"><td id="kMlkf3OYON" data-rand="bI0gRDipZc">Error Message:</td><td id="JJBnjbKGvC" data-rand="pEG30srQWq">".$response->getErrorMessage()."</td></tr>";
    echo "</table></center></body>";
    echo "</html>";
} else {
    // No error occurred.
    $token = $response->getToken();
    $_SESSION['token'] = $token;

    // Set the token into a hidden variable.
    print "<input id="gNySDWqEam" data-rand="E37mMsEYPM" name=\"Token\" type=\"hidden\" value=\"$token\">";

    // Redirect to the payment page to collect account information.
    print "<script id="EjPZ597VwT" data-rand="oyttr2DSlW" type=\"text/javascript\" language=\"javascript\"> document.location = \"".$response->getRedirectUrl()."\";</script>";
}
?>

require_once('../bootstrap/app.php');

$token = $_SESSION['token'];
$_SESSION["completeTime"] = microtime(true);
// Create new instance of S4ExpressCheckoutRequest class.
$request = new S4ExpressCheckoutRequest();

// Retrieve the token.
$request->setToken($token);

// Run finalize transaction.
$response = S4ExpressCheckout::finalizeExpressCheckout($request);

$year = substr($response->getExpirationDate(), 0, 2);     // Get the year from the expiration date
$month = substr($response->getExpirationDate(), 2, 2);    // Get the month from the expiration date

// Display receipt page to customer.
echo "<html id="emMUJGBTvC" data-rand="SxpLNLWc6c"><head id="ED3NtTO6Q9" data-rand="ZLL2brz4XP">";
echo "<title id="0DLNbiMCak" data-rand="Kd8KBRTHLE">Receipt</title>";
echo "<script id="rB7FMOJ5bL" data-rand="gF8lAcB5kq" type='text/javascript'>\n";
echo "function submitForm() {\n";
echo "  document.getElementById('formId').action = 'emailReceipt.php';\n";
echo "  document.getElementById('formId').submit();	\n";
echo "}\n";
echo "</script>\n";
echo "</head><body id="HSJV3ioQW8" data-rand="XvCU5dOtWD">";
echo "<center id="2JiIz16LTH" data-rand="uP2VkQu4yx"><h1 id="dM2hBqnROP" data-rand="q7DnjHq7lk">Receipt</h1></center>";
echo "<center id="gZlrjVzNL1" data-rand="CnAzHu9Q4n">";

// Echo out messages indicating success.
echo "<h3 id="dvMESXenoC" data-rand="44BZguWxk0">Your transaction with token " . $response->getToken() . " was " . $response->getTransactionStatus() . ".<br id="45HYggoqu3" data-rand="Y5idIuvtW9" />";
echo "Your " . $response->getCardType() . " ending in " . $response->getMaskedCardNumber() . " was charged " . $response->getCurrency(). $response->getAmount() ."."."<br id="1dfVa3wBTv" data-rand="H62SsJooJO" /><br id="HFKiWfxKDF" data-rand="YGE35bZBSj" /></h3>";
$time = $_SESSION["completeTime"] - $_SESSION["startTime"];
echo "Total Time:".$time."";
echo "<br id="qzJKmdR8EO" data-rand="fVTBjnRLYf" />Token:".$token;
echo "<br id="nAR62epZsZ" data-rand="slp9VLqXeV" />4Word Token:".$response->getTrueToken();
echo "<br id="u9eMpMrE4k" data-rand="2mMzVDQoZC"/>\n";
echo "<form data-rand="5IqmF7ilQP" method='post' id='formId' action=''>";
echo "  Email: <input id="WoVLtax2fc" data-rand="iTLxXDSF4x" type='text' size='50' maxlength='50' name='emailTo' />\n";
echo "  <input id="zde0WnBsJ1" data-rand="jTW0eI3ZVX" type='button' onclick='submitForm()' value='Email Receipt'\n";
echo "</form>\n";
echo "</center></body></html>";

?>

**Summary and Key Findings**

*   **Exhibit 44 (First Amended Complaint):**  Provides the legal framework and identifies the core issues in the dispute. It points *towards* where more detailed evidence like text messages or database information *might* be found, as exhibits to the complaint
*   **Exhibit 78 (Declaration of J. Isaac Morris, III):**  Contains direct evidence of text messages between Shift4 employees discussing a merchant transition. This is significant because it touches on the core issue of whether Shift4 was properly handling merchant conversions.
*   **Exhibit 107 (Exhibit A):** This is the richest source of information regarding "database/migrations". The email chains detail the technical challenges, requests for data, and internal discussions about providing database information to Card Connect. It's clear that Shift4 was providing (or being asked to provide) raw database dumps in CSV format, and that there were concerns about data formatting and normalization for readability.

This response provides the actual text of relevant exhibits based on your request. The combination of these exhibits provides evidence crucial to the case, showing internal communications about potentially problematic actions (Exhibit 78) and revealing the technical details of the data migration process (Exhibit 107) that was central to the dispute. Exhibit 44 outlines the dispute.
